WRITING.TEXT: Same man. It would feel great to taste the metal and know that I can go whenever I want.

WRITING.TITLE: I wished you listened
WRITING.TEXT: I tried to tell you. I thought you would listen. I told every fucking one and they all agreed even YOU agreed with me. So what the fuck happened? He's useless and you know it. I have nothing down here. You know that, so why why why did you throw me out? They all told you what I did but you didn't fucking listen. I'm in pain I can't feel anything. I'm confused I'm angry I'm lost and I suppose I'm sad. You lie to my face when I know the truth. You exposed my flesh for the maggots and vultures to feed on, thinking that the cancer that is there is cured. Yet it has only grown. I will be back. I will be worse. It will be your fault. Fuck you all.

WRITING.TITLE: I'm Sorry
WRITING.TEXT: Oh brother I'm sorry, I wish I was there To hug you, to save you and make sure you were alright I left you alone and for that, I am sorry I know you were scared, but I did not abandon you Till this day I still love you, and mourn you everyday Until the day we meet again

WRITING.TITLE: What are they?
WRITING.TEXT: I am very unsure on what this is. In basic terms I hear voices, but not in the terms of audible voices of another being. Rather it is my voice. For example when you need to remember a number you say the number inside your head right? That is the voices I hear. But I can't shut them up. And theres different ones my voice in my head but loud and different and they won't go away. I get so... frustrated? Sore? Im in almost pain when their there. It hurts. Fuck shut up their loud very loud. They won't shut up I can't make them go. Does anyone have a clue what this is? I've told my therapist she hasnt told me.
Thank you. They - Doctors You - Psychoanalysis

WRITING.TITLE: Hello
WRITING.TEXT: Hello, I think I have lost my soul. Some of you know this. Friends you do not and it is best that you don't. You all think I'm great even with my quirks. Thanks you all for that but my dear friends you have never seen the true me. They are angry. They are a liar. They have no soul. I'm sorry you are friends with a demon such as I, and its even worse becasue you don't know. Family you don't exist in my eyes sorry. Doctors you failed me. #8203; To the people who have future relations with me please be wary but this I highly doubt. As I am ready to die.
I told her if I were to kill myself my Doctor would know that she was wrong. She (psychoanalyst) responded by telling me that my Doctor would just put it down as another statistic and move on.
If you are set on it and no one will change your mind. I know how you feel. If you are already gone may you rest in peace.
Pills is the worse way to go bud. Never overdose it never works believe I've seen it and tried it.

I'm very sorry that I have not described the situation. On 19th November 2019 I was emitted into a mental hospital. I went willingly so I was voluntary patient. My stay there was great I got all the care I need since it was more avaliable since it is in a city and I am from a town. When lockdown was put in place I was sent home to live with family but was aloud to go back to the hospital if I got really bad. My discharge planning meeting was on 30/04/2020. I did not want to be discharged as I felt I was not ready, everyone who had been helping up until this point also agreed. Apart from my inpatient and outpatient Doctors. She (inpatient) discharged me against my will and left me with very little support. My psychoanalyst could only contact me by phone due to covid and that she can't travel to my town. I told her I wanted to prove my point to my inpatient Doctor that I was not ready to be discharged and she made a mistake. My outpatient Doctor is worse as he does not listen to me all he does is change my meds.
It made me feel safe. That I could get the chance to be better with the constant suppport.

No other hospital unfortunately. And mental health doctors are very rare where I am unless I go to the city which is too far from where I am. If I request a new doctor it will either take ages or be denied.
Only way to get back is through the crisis team and the only way to get to them is extreme self harm or suicide attempt. Thank you for this btw
I've tried to argue it didn't work. I've had a psychologist before while I was in there they did help but it doesn't really matter which one in my opinion. Again thank you.
Hopefully I'll try to update the post to let you know thanks

WRITING.TITLE: Me
WRITING.TEXT: what is this feeling? you dont know i dont know. it hurts i feel so sick i want to do it now but i cant i have to wait but i fear my time is running out. i can feel it coming you can to. soon so soon i hope soon. i can not wait to bleed my cold cold blood. #8203; i was always told that blood was warm but the blood which leaked from my skin was terribly cold oh dear oh dear i wish to bleed
yeah thats how it is. thats why you must make a dramatic exit to make people look at the living more than the dead

WRITING.TITLE: Cowards
WRITING.TEXT: People ask for help with death. Yet when I tell them how or offer them help, they run away? Oh you poor souls. You do not wish to die do you? You say so only for attention is it? Or because you want the help it brings? I despise people like you. Your the reason we can't get help. For the ones who are just scared. I am sorry. I can understand that as I was once scared too.

WRITING.TITLE: I do hate this world.
WRITING.TEXT: The fools are trying to fix this world. Don't you know its already gone? Let it happen so she can be reborn. So that we can destory this civilisation and start a new. With this we may be able to destory the evil which lurks and allow the good of this race to come through. Yet there is always evil. We can see it but choose to ignore it. If only we would kill it.
You are gone now, I do hope that you rest easy. Enjoy deaths sweet embrace and the joys of afterlife if it is real. May your soul rest easy.

WRITING.TITLE: You can feel it I know you can.
WRITING.TEXT: You can feel the fakeness of this world. The strings that they pull to mimic freewill. You think that you are free but none are. Some break the strings that hold them. But once broke they fall. Most can not withstand the fall. They break. People hide them. Broken people are ugly in their eyes. Broken is how you see. Break and stand. Fall and live. Awake and see.

WRITING.TITLE: The world is breaking. You are blind.
WRITING.TEXT: This world is at its breaking point. Look at it with a broken eye. You will see that this can not be fixed. The weak believe this is fixable. They are the weak for a reason. Weak minded and weak bodied these fools will perish. Prepare. Awake. Break.

WRITING.TITLE: The Gods are false.
WRITING.TEXT: Gods are not real. They died long ago. Give up your falsehoods. It makes you weak. Those who can not survive the break rely on false Gods. You were so close to awaking. But you feeble Gods stopped you. Burn your Gods. Burn your false heroes. For they are what makes you weak. Burn the weak.

WRITING.TITLE: No more repeating.
WRITING.TEXT: What do I have to do to make you understand that I am not like everyone else? That this is not normal, you do not think this way too. No matter what I say it seems none of you get it. I have tried for years to make people understand what goes on inside my head. I have fought with myself to tell you all, I have fought with myself to understand that it is real and not fake. But YOU all seem to not listen. Try try and try all I have ever done is try. I tried to get help, I AM trying but they kicked me to the curb. THEY believe that I'm fine now. Why why why? Do I have to show you my sins for you to understand? Do I have to commit the sin I wish to commit? Will then you finally see? Will then I finally be free? Will then I break and become who I am meant to be? For if that act creates the true me that shows that I am not fine, that I am a sinner, then I shall commit the act. It will be sweet and pretty and I will not show you it. I will count it one by one till that number rises to infinity. Then when I am at the point of the hunt when I become the hunted then I shall show my sins for you all to see then I will truely be set free and you will all see that we must all commit sin in order to be free. I await the day when the moon is full and my blood runs dry. That is the day that I shall commit the sins I have been lusting to commit. You fools don't know whats coming.
It is nice to feel something other than empty when I break. So yeah addicting would be the best word for it.
Animals are the only good thing in this world.

WRITING.TITLE: The ones with knowledge are always silenced.
WRITING.TEXT: This world is ruined. All by the ones you call your heros. How many of them can you truely say helped? How many of them can you say truely exist? There is no proof. Not anymore. All the heros of old die long ago. We must break the worlds heros for it to be born a new. Are you willing to sacrifice? #8203; A wonderous world this was meant to be. Awake. Break. Live.

WRITING.TITLE: I have such little care for anything anymore that even dying sounds boring.
WRITING.TEXT: Years have gone by and I have been begging. I have screamed at them all to help. I ranted to people I know and strangers online. I wanted to die so many times and even though I have lost all faith I still do. I lost the will to live but also the will to die. This place has completely broken me. The ones who look in on my life believe it is better. But how is losing the will to even die better? I planned for death. Not mine. At least I have not lost the will for that. The will to make this world break. Oh, how I wish to be God. For if I were we would have so much fun. Even writing this is boring me. Will someone read this? Will it be forgotten? How few people know this exists? I have seen people find place that support crime. They hate them. Call them filthy. Animals. Worthless. But the true worthless ones are themselves. For they do not know the true 'crimes' they are missing. When this world ends I hope they suffer. Along with most of this miserable race. For the fools are everywhere and always growing.
